title: Patch 7.24 FPS issues
body: Is anyone else getting bad frame drops since this patch? I've updated drivers and re-installed the client but I always drop to 100-90 frames which makes the game stutter like crazy. During team fights it goes as low as 40 fps. I used to get a consistent 120-117 until now {{item:3070}}

replies.body: The devs have been following these fps stutters over the past few patches in [this post over here](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/lZv6E2Xz-update-on-fps-issues-in-722-and-723). Do me a favor and go ahead and check out the other steps listed in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) just in case one of those steps can help.
So far I've tried everything but it persists {{sticker:sg-janna}}

Im lagging like hell and my fps is only around 47. My ms is ranging from 50-200.

RIOT PLS FIX THIS LAG.

thanks.

pc has all the current drivers/updates at the moment. Nothing seems to fix it, just hope they fix it soon the fps drop makes me not want to play as much as I would like to :'c

I know it's an old post but for those who still have this issues: I had some seriously fps issues after these patches and I tried almost everything. At the end, I solved the problem installing an old build of Win10. It looks like the problem (for me) was the windows creators fall update.
Hope it'll be useful for you!
Try uninstalling Overwolf, worked for me.

I have a decent PC and my fps was pretty decent previous patch like 100 but then it is for some time 100 then it drops then 100 and all over again the game is unplayable i updated drivers directx framework think i did everything from riot support fps issues, i hope there is an fix for this soon

I'm having terrible packet loss since last patch and it makes the game unplayable. I hope that DEV's team is already looking into it. I even performed a Clean install of windows 10 and reinstalled the game, but issue persist. This let me know there is definately something wrong with this last patch.
Did all that already, fix the game please. Undo whatever it was that you did to make it unplayable.

i have had fps drops also...but i think i fixed it....i switched from windowed borderless to fullscreen....now i dont see any lag.  Something must have been broken in one of the patches.  hope this help.  p.s. riot pls give me some free rp for testing this out.... ;)

Hi,
I was having 60-90 fps with a Ryzen 1700x and a 1070. (1440p) I use a program called CAM that shows GPU, CPU temps etc. I was also using a FPS overlay ingame. When i disabled the fps overlay I got a bugsplat. When reconnecting again I got 160-230fps.
Try to disable fps overlays. It might work, worked for me.
